citation.article-title: Oryzihumus leptocrescens gen. nov., sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Oryzihumus (Ory.zi.hu′mus. L. fem. n. oryza rice; L. masc. n. humus soil; N.L. masc. n. Oryzihumus rice soil).
Gram-positive, catalase-positive, aerobic, non-motile irregular rods.
The peptidoglycan is of the A type of direct cross-linkage and contains meso-diaminopimelic acid, alanine and glutamic acid.
The acyl type of the glycan chain of peptidoglycan is acetyl.
The DNA G+C content is 72–73 mol%.
Phylogenetically, this genus is a member of the family Intrasporangiaceae, suborder Micrococcineae.
The type species is Oryzihumus leptocrescens.
